check in.translation[0].definitions[0].d: if you check in or are checked in at a hotel or airport, you go to the desk and report that you have arrived
check in.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Check in two hours before the flight.
He checked in at the Europa Hotel.
Airline employees were checking in passengers.
check in.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to leave your bags at an official place so they can be put on a plane or a train, or to take someone’s bags in order to do this
check in.translation[0].definitions[1].e: I said goodbye and went to check in my suitcases.
check in.translation[0].definitions[2].d: to call someone to tell them that you are safe or where you are
check in.translation[0].definitions[2].e: He just called to check in and tell them how he was doing.
check in.translation[0].definitions[3].d: if a user of a social networking system checks in to a place, they show on the system that they are there
check in.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a place where you report your arrival at an airport, hotel, hospital etc
check in.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Make sure you’re at the check-in by 5.30.
check in.translation[1].definitions[1].d: the process of reporting your arrival at an airport, hotel, hospital etc
check in.translation[1].definitions[1].e: Ask your travel agent about check-in times.
check in.translation[1].definitions[2].d: the act of showing on a social networking system that you are at a particular place
check in.translation[2].definitions[0].d: to go to the desk at a hotel or airport and say that you have arrived
check in.translation[2].definitions[0].e: The keycard is authorised automatically when the guest checks in.
His suitcase was already checked in.
check in.translation[3].definitions[0].d: a place where you go to show your ticket and give in your bags before you get ready to board the plane, train, boat etc
check in.translation[3].definitions[0].e: We got to the check-in with plenty of time to spare.
check in.translation[3].definitions[1].d: the time when you have to arrive and show your ticket, before you get on a plane, train, boat etc
